product_name: Horny Toad Viggo Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Horny Toad Viggo Jacket is made with a modern organic cotton, hemp and recycled polyester blend that has all the allure of classic Scottish tweed without the stodgy scratchiness. Blend of organic cotton, natty hemp and recycled polyester has a soft texture. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Handwarmer pockets; internal drop-in pockets; zippered chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The Horny Toad Viggo Jacket is made with a modern organic cotton, hemp and recycled polyester blend that has all the allure of classic Scottish tweed without the stodgy scratchiness.
